nodeList.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
nodeList.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.description: While you have Aspect of the Panther you have additional critical strike multiplier. This does not scale with the number of stacks.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Aspect of the Panther grants [25%] additional critical strike multiplier per point.

node.description: While you have Aspect of the Panther you have increased critical strike chance. This does not scale with the number of stacks.
node.nodeDescription: Aspect of the Panther grants [25%] increased critical strike chance per point.

node.description: While you have Aspect of the Panther you have increased attack and cast speed. This does not scale with the number of stacks.
node.nodeDescription: Hitting an enemy with swipe grants Aspect of the Panther, increasing attack and cast speed by 15%.

node.description: When you attack with Swipe and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of Aspect of the Panther. Each stack increases your damage and lasts 4 seconds.
node.nodeDescription:
Gain 12% increased damage for 4 seconds when your swipe hits one enemy or more.

This effect can stack up to [2] times per point.

node.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.description: Swipe hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Adds [25%] chance to poison per point

node.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.altText: Physical Resistance Shred reduces Physical Resistance bt 5% (2% against bosses and players), lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times.
nodeList.description: Swipe has a chance to shred physical resistance on hit.

node.description: Swipe hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.
node.nodeDescription: Adds [25%] chance to poison per point

node.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.description: When you attack with Swipe and hit at least one enemy you gain health if you are transformed, or mana if you are not transformed.

node.altText: Physical Resistance Shred reduces Physical Resistance bt 5% (2% against bosses and players), lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times.
node.description: Swipe has a chance to shred physical resistance on hit.
Swipe hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.
node.nodeDescription: Adds [25%] chance to poison per point

node.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.description:
Swipe hits instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health). 

If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node then the highest threshold is used.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold ([7%] of their maximum health per point).

node.description: Swipe deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.
node.nodeDescription: [25%] increased area of effect per point. [5%] increased damage per point.

node.description: Swipe deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and leeches a portion of damage dealt as health.
node.nodeDescription: [5%] increased damage per point. [2%] of damage leeched as health per point.

node.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.description: While you have Aspect of the Panther you have increased critical strike chance. This does not scale with the number of stacks.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Aspect of the Panther grants [25%] increased critical strike chance per point.

node.description: While you have Aspect of the Panther you have increased attack and cast speed. This does not scale with the number of stacks.
node.nodeDescription: Hitting an enemy with swipe grants Aspect of the Panther, increasing attack and cast speed by 15%.

node.description: When you attack with Swipe and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of Aspect of the Panther. Each stack increases your damage and lasts 4 seconds.
node.nodeDescription:
Gain 12% increased damage for 4 seconds when your swipe hits one enemy or more.

This effect can stack up to [2] times per point.

node.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.altText:
Storm Claw is the node directly before this. It adds lightning damage every 3 seconds.

With one point in this node it will add lightning damage every 2.25 seconds.

With two points in this node it will add lightning damage every 1.5 seconds.
nodeList.description: The cooldown for the effect of the {Storm Claw} node is shorter.
nodeList.nodeDescription: The cooldown on the effect of the Storm Claw node is reduced by [25%] per point.

node.description: Every 3 seconds, your next Swipe deals additional base lightning damage.
node.nodeDescription: Every 3 seconds your next swipe deals 10 additional lightning damage

node.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

node.description: Swipe hits deal increased damage for each point of Attunement you have.
node.nodeDescription: Swipe deals 4% increased damage for each point of Attunement

node.altText: Claw totems use melee attacks and scale with your bonuses to minions and your attunement. Claw totems do not scale with other nodes on this tree.
node.description: You have a chance to summon a {Claw Totem} when Swipe kills an enemy, which uses melee attacks and scales with attunement and minion stats.
node.nodeDescription: [10%] chance per point to summon a claw totem when you kill an enemy.

node.description: Swipe deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and leeches a portion of damage dealt as health.
node.nodeDescription: [5%] increased damage per point. [2%] of damage leeched as health per point.

node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

stats.statName: Chance To Summon Claw Totem On Kill

nodeList.description: Swipe hits deal additional lightning damage.
nodeList.loreText: Umjol the Shaman taught his followers how to draw the power of lightning from the sky, even while Lagon rested.
nodeList.nodeDescription: +[3] additional lightning damage per point

node.description: Every 3 seconds, your next Swipe deals additional base lightning damage.
node.nodeDescription: Every 3 seconds your next swipe deals 10 additional lightning damage

nodeList.description: While you have Aspect of the Panther you deal increased melee damage. This does not scale with the number of stacks.

node.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.altText: The damage dealt by the spirit wolves scales with melee damage, minion damage, strength, and attunement, but not with other nodes from this tree.
nodeList.description: Swipe hits call forth 3 {Spirit Wolves} to dash through and damage enemies, dealing melee and minion damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription: You call forth 3 spirit wolves to run through and damage your enemies when your swipe hits one enemy or more.

node.description: Swipe deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and slow enemies, but Swipe has a cooldown.
node.loreText: A bear need only strike once to claim its prey
node.nodeDescription: Adds a 2 second cooldown, but increases damage by 70% and adds 100% chance to slow.

node.nodeDescription: [25%] increased area of effect per point. [5%] increased damage per point.

node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
nodeList.description: If you have an active totem, Swipe hits have a chance to shock enemies.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [35%] chance to shock per point if you have an active totem

node.description: Swipe hits deal additional lightning damage.

node.loreText: A primalist should wield his weapon like the claws of a bear, like the talons of an eagle.
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in an area in front of you. Unaffected by weapon range.

nodeList.description:
While Swipe is on cooldown you can still cast it, causing you to perform a basic melee attack instead.

You have increased melee attack speed and melee damage if you have hit an enemy with Swipe in the past 4 seconds.
nodeList.nodeDescription: If you try to attack with Swipe while it's on cooldown you will perform a basic melee attack instead.\n\nYou have 15% increased melee attack speed and melee damage if you have hit an enemy with Swipe in the past 4 seconds.
